title: The Trinity - Fact or Fiction?
description:
This brief but engaging article, entitled "Where Two or Three are Gathered," asks and answers the question: "Is the Trinity Biblical?"


The Christian community may be surprised to find out that this question is not a new one - for hundreds of years, it has been at the root of persecutions, debates, and inquisitions. 

When did the doctrine originate? Where did the word "Trinity" come from? What does the Bible say about this doctrine, directly and indirectly? Is God three-in-one-in-three? Is the Holy Spirit a person in the same sense as the Father and Son? 

These and more questions are addressed with an in-depth examination of every central Scripture to the teaching.
